OrgName.entry: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR VOLUNTARY AND COMMUNITY ACTION (NAVCA)

AltName.entry: NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF COUNCILS FOR VOLUNTARY SERVICE (NACVS), (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A registered charity with a growing network of over 350 local infrastructure organisations throughout England. Helps to promote voluntary and community action by supporting member organisations and by acting as a national voice for the voluntary and community sector. Helps maintain a charity and voluntary sector recruitment website http://www.goodmoves.org.uk

Pubs.entry: Annual Report; Trainers and Consultants On-line Directory at http://www.trainersandconsultantsdirect.org.uk
